title: Andrei Rapeika
text:
Andrei Albinovich Rapeika (; ; born 21 September 1971) is a former <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Belarusian%20Premier%20League">Belarusian Premier League</a> in 1992 for <a href="FC%20Shakhtyor%20Soligorsk">Shakhtyor Soligorsk</a> . He played 6 games in the <a href="1997%20UEFA%20Intertoto%20Cup">1997 UEFA Intertoto Cup</a> for <a href="FC%20Lokomotiv%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod</a>.
